items.title: Collaborative Task Management
items.description: Enable users to create, assign, and track tasks within teams, with real-time updates and shared visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Team members can view all tasks assigned to their team
Task status updates are visible to all team members in real time
Users can comment on tasks and mention other team members
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Real-time updates should have latency under 2 seconds

notes: The requirement is high-level and lacks details on integrations, permissions, and platform scope. Assumed core functionality includes task creation, assignment, tracking, and team collaboration.
